Children h__ to we__ tight a__ uncomfortable clo____. Raising a child w__ thought t_ be o__ of t__ most impo_____ things. Adults wanted children to use reason in learning.
data.fullContent: At the time of the Reformation, children were thought to be born evil. Adults thought children needed to be taught to be a person. Children had to wear tight and uncomfortable clothes. Raising a child was thought to be one of the most important things. Adults wanted children to use reason in learning.
data.answer: 在宗教改革时期，孩子被认为是天生邪恶的。成年人认为孩子需要被教育成一个人。孩子们必须穿又紧又不舒服的衣服。抚养孩子被认为是最重要的事情之一。成年人希望孩子们在学习中运用理性。
